commitollama.model.description: Specify the desired model for generating commit messages.

commitollama.useEmojis.description: Enable or disable the use of emojis in commit messages.

commitollama.useDescription.description: Enable or disable the use of commit descriptions.

commitollama.commitEmojis.description: Map commit types to emojis. Only used if emojis are enabled.

commitollama.custom.endpoint.description: Ollama Server Endpoint. Leave empty to use the default ollama endpoint.

commitollama.custom.model.description: Allows you to specify any model name. The model has to be downloaded and available on your Ollama instance. **Note:** Ignored if `commitollama.model` is not set to "Custom".

commitollama.custom.summaryPrompt.description: Custom prompt to summarize the git diff.

commitollama.custom.summaryTemperature.description: Custom temperature to summarize the git diff. (Higher number = more creative)

commitollama.custom.commitPrompt.description: Custom prompt to generate the commit message with.

commitollama.custom.commitTemperature.description: Custom temperature for generating the commit message. (Higher number = more creative)

commitollama.custom.scopePrompt.description: Custom prompt to generate the scope with.

commitollama.custom.scopeTemperature.description: Custom temperature for generating the scope. (Higher number = more creative)

commitollama.useLowerCase.description: Enable or disable lowercase commit messages.

scripts.publish:minor: npm run build && vsce publish minor
scripts.publish:patch: npm run build && vsce publish patch
